item.title: Level 200: Manage Workload Risks with OpsCenter
item.description: Authors Mahanth Jayadeva, Solutions Architect, AWS Well-Architected Introduction In this lab, you will become familiar with how you can better manage workload risks identified in the AWS Well-Architected Tool (AWS WA Tool). You will learn how to efficiently track risks across your entire technology portfolio while maintaining a single source of truth for risk information in an automated manner. Most workloads contain risks or opportunities for improvement which can lead to better business outcomes when addressed.
